description: Glowing Jello Shots are a fun way to get your drink on. They're also an interesting choice if you want something different from the usual cup of punch that everyone else seems to enjoy during Halloween!
name: Glowing Jello Shots

recipeInstructions.name: For the first layer, pour one cup of tonic water into a pot over high heat. Once it comes to a boil, add the Jell-o mix. Whisk until these flavors have dissolved, then pour in half a cup of water and Vodka. Mix well.
recipeInstructions.text: For the first layer, pour one cup of tonic water into a pot over high heat. Once it comes to a boil, add the Jell-o mix. Whisk until these flavors have dissolved, then pour in half a cup of water and Vodka. Mix well.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the mixture into the molds, filling them up about 2/3. Refrigerate for 30-35 minutes to set.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the mixture into the molds, filling them up about 2/3. Refrigerate for 30-35 minutes to set.

recipeInstructions.name: For the second layer, follow the same process done in the first layer.
recipeInstructions.text: For the second layer, follow the same process done in the first layer.

recipeInstructions.name: Top the first layer into the second layer. Return the shots into the fridge and let it sit for 2-3 hours.
recipeInstructions.text: Top the first layer into the second layer. Return the shots into the fridge and let it sit for 2-3 hours.
